attributes.action: Review the schools that have been involved in Rape Culture in the UK
attributes.background: We want parliament to review the list of schools that have been involved in rape culture and along with ofsted should investigate each and every school.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Ofsted and, where appropriate the police.

If you think that a crime has been committed, you should contact the police here:

https://www.police.uk/contact/
